citation.title: A simple rule-based part of speech tagger.
citation.booktitle: In Proceedings of the third conference on Applied natural language processing,
citation.rawString: BRILL E. (1992). A simple rule-based part of speech tagger. In Proceedings of the third conference on Applied natural language processing, p. 152–155, Morristown, NJ, USA : Association for Computational Linguistics.

citation.title: Probabilistic part-of-speech tagging using decision trees.
citation.booktitle: In Proceedings of the International Conference on New Methods in Language Processing,
citation.rawString: SCHMID H. (1994). Probabilistic part-of-speech tagging using decision trees. In Proceedings of the International Conference on New Methods in Language Processing, p. 44–49. 9Tous ces éléments sont archivés à l’adresse http://recherche.fabienpoulard.info/taln2010. Le composant HMMTagger pour UIMA est disponible à l’adresse http://uima.apache.org/sandbox.html#tagger. annotator, il suffit de le configurer pour utiliser notre modèle hmmtagger_model_fr_20100501.dat présent dans l’archive.
